properties.desc: a swarm of four boys riding around us. only one of which had masks. made it difficult to avoid them since they were not riding in a discernable pattern.
man wearing mask riding bike weaving in and out on the sidewalk.
man walking toward us in the middle of the sidewalk.
group of men riding by on bikes. purposefully got close to us and tried to speak to us while speeding by.
man without mask riding bike down the middle of the sidewalk.
man stopped in the middle of the sidewalk to talk to people he apparently knew. his friends didn't try to move either. we ended up jaywalking because we had no choice.
man ran right by us, within a foot, on the narrowest path of the sidewalk. come the fuck on.
man skatboarding down the middle of the crosswalk. didn't try to move for anyone.
man ran up right behind us while we were walking. he was within 2 feet of us.
man walking down the middle of the sidewalk paying no mind to those trying to distance from him.
man riding bike on sidewalk right behind us while we were waiting for the crosswalk.
